entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • VS 17.4 Preview 2.1 - System.ArgumentException: An item with the same key has already been added. #10408
  • [Android12-API31] Entry: changing IsPassword false to true, does not show the numbers, when Keyboard attribute is "Numeric" #10407
  • Investigate IndicatorView accessibility #10404
    Backlog
  • Button does not respond to clicks on lower area of the screen on Android #10403
    Backlog
  • Shadow.Radius on Android13 [API 33] is broken #10401
  • Net 7 Map control Is it possible to supply a new icon image for each pin location? #10400
  • XAMLC error using array for view model collection #10399
  • [Windows] Overlapping CollectionView Layouts #10398
    Backlog
  • NavigationPageRenderer is broken in .net7 #10397
    Backlog
  • XamlC compiler null-refs when encountering a binding to an array access #10396
    Backlog
  • MAUI Blazor App allow enabling WebGPU on Android/iOS/Mac #10395
  • .NET 7: Maps control doesn't show zoom controls with constant IsZoomEnabled="true" #10394
    Backlog
  • Images and FontImageSource do not display in ios 16 #10392
  • Uneven margin/padding along OnPlatform #10391
    Backlog
  • [CustomControl] HotReload works for nested items that derive from Element but not for items that derive from VisualElement #10390
  • Editor within Frame causes application freeze for Windows #10387
    Backlog
  • Add `UserAgent` property to `WebView` control. #10386
    Backlog
  • Android Issue - MediaPicker #10385
    Backlog

Closed

  • Shell flyout does not update when item selected from shell tab #9761
    Backlog
  • .Net maui blazor app does not work in some phones #10388
  • Adding ContentPage - CS0103 The name 'InitializeComponent' does not exist in the current context #10292
  • PNG images are not generated from SVGs for MAUI libraries targeting Android or iOS #10019
    Backlog
  • Label inside a HorizontalStackLayout inside a Border does not work with TailTruncation #8925
    Backlog
  • debug and release show different NavBar colors #10315
  • [Bug] MAUI icon don't get resized to proper size on Android, renders extra accent overlay on Windows #10219
    Backlog
  • WebView hyperlink click navigation doesn't contain clicked URL on Android #8648
  • System.IO.FileLoadException: 'Could not load file or assembly 'WinRT.Runtime, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=99ea127f02d97709'. #10215
  • .NET MAUI Blazor UWP doesn't not allow camera access through javascript library or functions. #10176
  • Use of FlyoutHeaderBehavior="CollapseOnScroll" causes an exceptio #9699
    Backlog
  • Windows Shell Flyout Issue (On Scroll Exception Break) #8341
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Added groupId to ResourceDictionary template #10389
    area/tooling ⚙️, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • Propagate Flyout Selected Item w/ AsMultipleItems #10295
    area/shell 🐢, 7.0
  • Provisioning more android images #10393
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Disconnect lifecycle callback when nav removed #10353
    platform/android 🤖, area/lifecycle 🔁, 7.0-rc2
  • Sizing and inset math corrections for Button contentlayout #10309
    area/controls 🎮, 7.0-rc2
  • PhoneCallManager no longer works on Windows 11 #10381
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [Windows] Fix crash scrolling Shell Flyout list (CollapseOnScroll) #9962
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢

Updated

  • Update Package.appxmanifest to have PhonePublisherId #9477
    partner/winui, do-not-merge, community ✨
  • Update docs animations #9746
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Bumps for 7.0.0-rc2 #10290
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Android] Implement PointerGestureRecognizer for Android #10352
  • [Catalyst] Fix brushes in Frame #7925
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, control-frame, .NET 7 Planning
  • Update Font inline docs #10014
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Allow to reset an Image setting the Source to null #10371
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • [android] bring back `$(AndroidLinkResources)` by default #10153
    platform/android 🤖, area/app-size 🤏, area/perf 🏎️, 7.0
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10358
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, platform/tizen
